amendment.description: To offset the costs of the war against the Islamic State in Iraq and Syria.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 802 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 802 proposed by Senator Coons. (consideration: CR S1877; text: CR S1877) To offset the costs of the war against the Islamic State in Iraq and Syria.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 802 proposed by Senator Coons.
